questionTitle: Which of the following is storage data interchange interface for stored data objects?
questionExplanation: OCCI stands for Open Cloud Computing Interface.

questionOption1: To determine whether your application will port successfully, you should perform a functionality mapping exercise
questionOption2: Cloud computing supports some application features better than others
questionOption3: Cloud bursting is an overflow solution that clones the application to the cloud and directs traffic to the cloud during times of high traffic
questionExplanation: Mapping process involves determining the critical application features and then matching them to the cloud providerâ€™s offering to see if those features can be supported.

questionTitle: ________ data represents more than 50 percent of the data created every day.
questionExplanation: Lots of shadow data does get retained, having never been touched by a human being.

questionTitle: Cloud storage data usage in the year 2020 is estimated to be _____________ percent resident by IDC.
questionExplanation: There will be a steady growth of cloud storage at the expense of online storage over the next decade.

questionOption1: Some APIs are both exposed as SOAP and REST
questionOption2: The role of a cloud vendor specific API has impact on porting an application
questionOption3: There are mainly three types of cloud storage
questionExplanation: Cloud storage can be either unmanaged or managed.

questionTitle: Which of the following system does not provision storage to most users?
questionExplanation: Cloud storage is storage accessed by a Web service API.

questionTitle: The addition of a software package on top of a cloud storage volume makes most cloud storage offerings conform to a ________ as a Service model.
questionExplanation: Most users interact with cloud storage using backup, synchronization, archiving, staging, caching, or some other sort of software.

questionTitle: How many categories of storage devices broadly exist in cloud?
questionExplanation: Storage devices may be broadly categorized as either block storage devices or file storage devices.

questionTitle: Which of the following storage devices exposes its storage to clients as Raw storage that can be partitioned to create volumes?
questionExplanation: It is up to the operating system to create and manage the file system.

questionTitle: Which of the following impose additional overhead on clients and offer faster transfer?
questionExplanation: File-oriented storage devices are generally slower, but require less overhead from attached clients.
